revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #39 Rindo |image = [[File:Rindo.png]] |caption = This Berry has a disagreeable "green" flavor and scent typical of vegetables. It is rich in health-promoting fiber. It has a tendency to expand into nearby plots. |growtime = 8h 0m 0s |harvest = 24 berries |replant = 5% |points = 1,400 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *15 bitter *0 sour }} == Description == '''Rindo''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 10, but no more than 15 points of spicy, at least 15, but no more than 20 points of bitter and 0 points of all other flavours. The [[Cheri]] and [[Aguav]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour || 2 hours || 4 hours 30 mins || 8 hours - 16 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RindoTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RindoTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RindoTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 8 hours -
16 hours || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 5 hours 20 mins -
10 hours 40 mins || 64 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 3 hours 33 mins 20 secs -
7 hours 6 mins 40 secs || 43 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Rindo berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || || || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] || || || [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] || |- | || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || || || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || || || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || || || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || |- | || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || || || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="collapsible wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Aguav]] || - || - || - |- | [[Figy]]
'''OR'''
[[Cheri]] || -
'''OR'''
30 secs until ripe || -
'''OR'''
20 secs until ripe || -
'''OR'''
Not Practical |} Note: Figy and Aguav have equivalent growth times {{Berries}}

{{Infobox Berry |name = #39 Rindo |image = [[File:Rindo.png]] |caption = This Berry has a disagreeable "green" flavor and scent typical of vegetables. It is rich in health-promoting fiber.
